BIO

Simple Biography

To be or not to be

Married for 5 years, I enjoy spending time with my wife and going on walks and hikes with our dog, Sami. I enjoy playing ice-hockey and golf. If I have free time, I search YouTube to try and learn something new. I enjoy reading and watching movies.

Work History

Knowledge + Experience = Success

Between 2013-early 2016 I worked as a project manager for Dell EMC. overseeing the coordination of remote developers to onsite engineers. Since 2016 I have worked for doTERRA International as the Manager of their onboarding/training department.

Career Aspirations

Full Stack Developer

I would love to be in a position of constant learning. Seeing a project from early development through deployment is incredibly satisfying and I believe pushes developers to produce their greatest work.
